title: Interactive Exercise: User Profile Manager
description:
Create a user profile management system that:
1. Saves user profiles to JSON file
2. Loads user profiles from JSON file  
3. Adds a new user profile
4. Updates an existing user profile
5. Displays all profiles

Each profile should have: username, email, age, premium (boolean)

**Your task:**
Implement the functions below.
